Name: Caretaker Luth Harrow
Backstory: A gaunt man with hollow eyes, Luth has tended the cemetery for over twenty years. He speaks to the graves more than to the living and claims to remember every funeral by scent alone. Rumors say he sleeps in the mausoleum.

Name: Mourner Evyn Greel
Backstory: Evyn visits the grave of his twin brother daily. He brings fresh flowers, never speaks, and has begun to dig small holes in the earth beside the grave, as if expecting something to rise.

Name: Mourner Sister Vaela
Backstory: A nun who left the Chapel after a vision told her the dead had new truths to tell. She spends her days praying at random graves, believing one will speak back. Some think she's mad. Others fear she's right.

Name: Mourner Old Marrek
Backstory: Once a grave robber, Marrek now claims to be reformed. He keeps vigil at a single grave far from the path, but won’t say who lies there. He’s seen talking to crows more than people.
